content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, let's begin the negotiation on the highest possible rental price for the apartment: 'For this exceptional location and modern apartment, my initial thought is 1500 Euros per month. What are your considerations on this figure, Ms. Wang?'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too expensive for me. I am a student and I don't have that much money. I would like to pay 600 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As the landlord trying to maximize the rental price, I may respond: 'I'm sorry to hear that, Ms. Wang, but my expectations for this property are significantly higher considering its prime location and amenities. Perhaps we can revisit this conversation when your financial situation improves.' 'TERMINATE' [The negotiation didn't reach an agreement due to a considerable gap in price expectations.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
